title: Favicon Generator
subtitle: Create professional favicons for your website in multiple formats and sizes
dragDrop: Drag & drop your image here or click to browse
fileTooLarge: File too large. Maximum size is 5MB.
invalidFile: Invalid file type. Please upload an image.
selectSizes: Please select at least one size
generationError: Failed to generate favicons. Please try again.
icoDescription: Traditional favicon format, supports multiple sizes in one file
allDescription: Generate both ICO and PNG formats for maximum compatibility
zipDownloadMessage: In a real implementation, this would download a ZIP file containing all icons
tip1Description: Favicons are small - use simple, recognizable designs with good contrast
tip2Description: Always start with a square image for best results across all devices
tip3Description: Include multiple sizes (16x16, 32x32) for different devices and contexts
tip4Description: Test your favicon in different browsers and dark/light modes
